Verses: 1 pinnum Karththar Moseyai Nokki:
2 nee Isravel Puththirarukku Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Naan Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar.

3 neengal Kudiyirundha Egipthudhesaththaarudaiya Seygaiyinpadi Seyyaamalum, Naan Ungalai Azhaiththuppogira Kaanaan Dhesaththaarudaiya Seygaiyinpadi Seyyaamalum, Avargaludaiya Muraimaigalinpadi Nadavaamalum ,
4 ennudaiya Nyaayangalinpadi Seydhu, Ennudaiya Kattalaigalaik Kaikkondu Nadavungal; Naan Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar.
5 aagaiyaal En Kattalaigalaiyum En Nyaayangalaiyum Kaikkollakkadaveergal; Avaigalinpadi Seygiravan Evanum Avaigalaal Pizhaippaan; Naan Karththar.
6 oruvanum Thanakku Nerungina Inamaagiya Oruththiyai Nirvaanamaakkumpadi Avalai Seralaagaadhu; Naan Karththar.
7 un Thagappanaiyaavadhu Un Thaayaiyaavadhu Nirvaanamaakkalaagaadhu; Aval Un Thaayaanaval; Avalai Nirvaanamaakkalaagaadhu.
8 un Thagappanudaiya Manaiviyai Nirvaanamaakkalaagaadhu; Adhu Un Thagappanudaiya Nirvaanam.
9 un Thagappanukkaavadhu Un Thaaikkaavadhu Veettilaagilum Puraththilaagilum Pirandha Kumaaraththiyaagiya Un Sagodhariyai Nirvaanamaakkalaagaadhu.
10 un Kumaaranudaiya Magalaiyaavadhu Un Kumaaraththiyinudaiya Magalaiyaavadhu Nirvaanamaakkalaagaadhu Adhu Unnudaiya Nirvaanam.
11 un Thagappanudaiya Manaiviyinidaththil Un Thagappanukkup Pirandha Kumaaraththiyai Nirvaanamaakkalaagaadhu; Aval Unakku Sagodhari.
12 un Thagappanudaiya Sagodhariyai Nirvaanamaakkalaagaadhu; Aval Un Thagappanukku Nerungina Inamaanaval.
13 un Thaayinudaiya Sagodhariyai Nirvaanamaakkalaagaadhu; Aval Un Thaaikku Nerungina Inamaanaval.
14 un Thagappanudaiya Sagodharanai Nirvaanamaakkalaagaadhu; Avan Manaiviyai Seraayaaga; Aval Un Thagappanudaiya Sagodhari.
15 un Marumagalai Nirvaanamaakkalaagaadhu; Aval Un Kumaaranukku Manaivi, Avalai Nirvaanamaakkalaagaadhu.
16 un Sagodharanudaiya Manaiviyai Nirvaanamaakkalaagaadhu; Adhu Un Sagodharanudaiya Nirvaanam.

17 oru Sthreeyaiyum Aval Magalaiyum Nirvaanamaakkalaagaadhu; Avaludaiya Kumaararin Magalaiyum Avaludaiya Kumaaraththiyin Magalaiyum Nirvaanamaakkumpadi Vivaagampannalaagaadhu; Ivargal Avalukku Nerungina Inamaanavargal; Adhu Muraikedu.
18 un Manaivi Uyirodirukkaiyil, Avalukku Ubaththiravamaaga Aval Sagodhariyaiyum Nirvaanamaakkumporuttu Avalai Vivaagampannalaagaadhu.
19 sthreeyaanaval Soothagaththaal Vilakkaththilirukkaiyil, Avalai Nirvaanamaakka Avalode Seraadhe.
20 piranudaiya Manaiviyode Serumpadi Sayaniththu, Avalaal Unnaith Theettuppaduththikkollavendaam.
21 nee Un Sandhadhiyil Yaaraiyaagilum Molegukkendru Theekkadakkumpadi Idankodaadhe; Un Dhevanudaiya Naamaththaip Parisuththak Kulaichchalaakkaadhe; Naan Karththar.
22 pennodu Samyogam Pannugiradhupola  Aanode Samyogam Pannavendaam; Adhu Aruvaruppaanadhu.
23 yaadhoru Mirugaththodum Nee Punarchchi Seydhu, Adhinaale Unnaith Theettuppaduththavendaam; Sthreeyaanaval Mirugaththode Punarumpadi Adharku Munbaaga Nirkalaagaadhu; Adhu Aruvaruppaana Thaarumaaru.

24 ivaigalil Ondrinaalum Ungalaith Theettuppaduththaadhirungal; Naan Ungal Munnindru Thuraththividugira Jaadhigal Ivaigalellaavatrinaalum Thangalaith Theettuppaduththiyirukkiraargal; Dhesamum Theettuppaduththappattirukkiradhu.
25 aagaiyaal Adhin Akkiramaththai Visaarippen; Dhesam Than Kudigalaik Kakkippodum.
26 indha Aruvaruppugalaiyellaam Ungalukkumun Irundha Andha Dhesaththin Manidhar Seydhadhinaale Dhesam Theettaayitru.
27 ippozhudhu Ungalukku Mun Irundha Jaadhigalai Dhesam Kakkippottadhupola, Neengal Adhaith Theettuppaduththumpodhu Adhu Ungalaiyum Kakkippodaadhapadikku,
28 neengal En Kattalaigalaiyum En Nyaayangalaiyum Kaikkondu, Dhesaththile Pirandhavanaanaalum Ungal Naduve Thangugira Anniyanaanaalum Indha Aruvaruppukkalil Ondraiyum Seyyavendaam.
29 ippadippatta Aruvaruppaanavaigalil Yaadhondrai Yaaraavadhu Seydhaal, Seydha Andha Aaththumaakkal Janaththil Iraadhapadikku Aruppundupovaargal.

30 aagaiyaal Ungalukkumun Seyyappatta Aruvaruppaana Muraimaigalil Yaadhondrai Neengal Seydhu, Avaigalaal Ungalaith Theettuppaduththikkollaadhapadikku En Kattalaiyaik Kaikkollungal; Naan Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Endru Sol Endraar.
